fixes.name: Is High Likes
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the row-level boolean expression to a calculated column and replaced [Likes_Received_Per_Day] with 'test+'[Likes_Received_Per_Day] to follow Power BI column reference syntax.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation evaluates a per-row comparison without any aggregations or parameters, so it should be created as a calculated column (dimension).
